Sentencas: Benefitting from high-temperature operating conditions, solid GO oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) exhibit high electricity efficiency and can be coupled with conventional engines such as gas turbines, to achieve cascaded energy utilization.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: However, high temperature inevitably accelerates material deterioration, and simultaneously complicates the on-line diagnosis of SOFCs.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) is a mature on-line testing technology that is been widely used in SOFC research.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: Using EIS analyses, researchers can clearly determine the ohmic resistance of pure ion/electron conduction and the magnitude of the polarization impedance of electrochemical processes or diffusion.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: However, the lack of decomposition of polarization impedance constitutes a limitation for the deeper understanding 'YSZk of SOFC operation.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: To better utilize information-rich EIS, this work used a typical Ni-Y2O3 stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anode-supported SOFC and designed a complete set of impedance tests by modifying the test temperature, anode operating atmosphere, and cathode operating atmosphere.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: In addition, this study combined two advanced impedance spectrum analysis methods: the analysis of differences in impedance spectra (ADIS) and distribution of relaxation time (DRT) methods to allow for a deeper comprehension of the impedance spectrum and obtain the characteristic frequency of each process in the SOFC.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: Based on the characteristic frequency obtained by the spectral decomposition, this study analyzed and explained the physical or (electro-) chemical origins of the impedance in each frequency band.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: In addition, the equivalent circuit method (ECM) was adopted to fit the SOFC impedance spectra by 6 (RQ) parallel circuits to summarize the impedance distribution.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: The ADIS method was more convenient than the DRT method and could be used to initially determine the range of characteristic frequencies.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: However, it failed to provide a clear decomposition for the high-frequency region of the impedance spectrum.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: The DRT method can yield a good decomposition of a single impedance spectrum, and the characteristic frequency of Ni-YSZ SOFC was separated into similar to 2, similar to 20, similar to 30, 1 x 10(3)-1.5 x 10(3) , 2 x 10(3)-4 x 10(3), and similar to 4 x 10(4) Hz regions.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: The highest frequency (similar to 4 x 10(4)) region was dominated by charge transfer impedance at the YSZ/GDC (gadolinia doped ceria) or LSCF/GDC interface.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra
Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: Hz correspond to the H-2 electrochemical reaction at the Ni/YSZ/H-2 boundary and O-2 reduction at the LSCF/O-2 boundary, respectively.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: The impedance at lower frequencies can be explained by diffusion polarization impedance.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: In this study, similar to 20 Hz corresponds to the cathode diffusion impedance, and similar to 30 Hz corresponds to the anode diffusion resistance.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: At a frequency of similar to 2 Hz, the impedance magnitude is influenced by both cathode and anode diffusion.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra

Sentencas: The results of this study combined three methods (ADIS, DRT, and ECM) for SOFC impedance investigations, and lays a foundation for future studies regarding SOFC performance degradation and degradation characteristics based on DRT analysis.
Titulo: Differentiation and Decomposition of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrochemical Impedance Spectra
